selections.name: Star Of Stirling
selections.reason: Consistent performer who put in a solid effort for 2nd at Geelong over 2353m last start. The drop back to 2100m suits and draws well.

selections.name: Paramount War
selections.reason: Showed improvement last start finishing 2nd at Great Western. Looks ready to peak here.

selections.name: Stolen Stock
selections.reason: Finished 3rd two starts back and wasn't disgraced last time out. Can feature in the placings.

selections.name: Instinctive Spirit
selections.reason: Has been around the mark with a 4th last start. Draws the inside gate.

danger_horse.name: Paramount War
danger_horse.reason: Improving type who hit the line well last start.

selections.name: Flood And Fire
selections.reason: Consistent galloper who ran a solid 3rd last start. Maps well from barrier 4 and looks the one to beat.

selections.name: High Torque
selections.reason: Veteran who showed he still has it with a good 2nd last start. Will be running on.

selections.name: Littlebitcheeky
selections.reason: Winner two starts back. Forgive last run, can bounce back here.

selections.name: Reel Hot
selections.reason: Coming off a maiden win. This is harder but has confidence.

danger_horse.name: High Torque
danger_horse.reason: Recent form suggests he is close to a win.

selections.name: Equivaster
selections.reason: Ran a huge race on debut to cross the line with the leaders but was disqualified (weighed in light). Linda Meech sticks. Big chance.

selections.name: Burleigh
selections.reason: Consistent maiden performer. Placed 2nd at Geelong three starts back. Solid each-way hope.

selections.name: Sunset Royale
selections.reason: Not far away when 4th last start. Draws well and should be competitive.

selections.name: Pursuant
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start and strips fitter here. Good draw.

danger_horse.name: Burleigh
danger_horse.reason: Has the form on the board to threaten.

selections.name: Buttercup
selections.reason: Very consistent with three placings in a row. Deserves a win and Meech rides.

selections.name: Racey Casey
selections.reason: Finished 4th last start and 2nd prior. In the mix.

selections.name: Immortal Justice
selections.reason: Placed 3rd last start. Wide gate is a concern but has ability.

selections.name: Rich King
selections.reason: Not beaten far last start (5th). Can improve from a good barrier.

danger_horse.name: Racey Casey
danger_horse.reason: Consistent type who is knocking on the door.

selections.name: Hellofacury
selections.reason: Excellent 2nd last start. Improving with every run and looks the one to beat despite the wide draw.

selections.name: Parish Priest
selections.reason: Consistent runner with two 2nd placings from last three starts. Draws perfectly.

selections.name: Positive Image
selections.reason: Solid 4th last start. Linda Meech takes the ride which is a positive signal.

selections.name: Blacklip
selections.reason: Finished 5th last start in a decent race. Place claims.

danger_horse.name: Parish Priest
danger_horse.reason: Maps to get a lovely run and will challenge late.

selections.name: In Her Stride
selections.reason: Drops in class here. Ran a good 3rd last start and has won at this track. Top pick.

selections.name: Loose On Gin
selections.reason: Coming off a strong 2nd placing. Consistent form and looks a major threat.

selections.name: Jet Jitsu
selections.reason: Finished 3rd last start. Linda Meech rides and draws well.

selections.name: Ottelia
selections.reason: Last start winner. Steps up in grade but must be respected.

danger_horse.name: Loose On Gin
danger_horse.reason: In good form and hits the line hard.

selections.name: Pentonville Road
selections.reason: Great run for 2nd last start. Drawn to get a soft run and go one better.

selections.name: Youraway
selections.reason: Also coming off a 2nd placing. Racing well and is a key contender.

selections.name: Shooter Mcgavin
selections.reason: Winner two starts back. 6th last time but capable of bouncing back.

selections.name: Volkano
selections.reason: Lightly raced and has ability. Meech rides from a good gate.

danger_horse.name: Youraway
danger_horse.reason: Form is solid and fits well in this field.

selections.name: Wild Willy
selections.reason: Last start winner who is in peak form. Hard to go past.

selections.name: Crackerjack Hatch
selections.reason: Won maiden impressively. Declan Bates rides. Big danger.

selections.name: Elliotto
selections.reason: Finished 2nd last start. Consistent type who will be thereabouts.

selections.name: Handy Friend
selections.reason: Another last start runner-up. Good draw and competitive.
